About Me

Hi, I'm Sujay – a UX Designer and Marine Corps veteran with 5+ years of experience building secure, intuitive software for public sector and military users. I’m passionate about human-centered systems that empower people.

Featured Projects

🧭 Interactive Mapping App – U.S. Navy

Tools: Angular, FastAPI, PostgreSQL, Figma

Summary: Designed an intuitive GUI for deployed sailors. Built interactive mapping interface, reduced lookup time by 60%, deployed after usability testing.

🔐 Privacy Workflow – Contra Costa County

Tools: ServiceNow, Figma, SharePoint

Summary: Streamlined HIPAA compliance reporting. Created user-friendly automation and dashboard system adopted across departments.

🛡 Jail Management System Redesign

Tools: Notion, Interviews, Accessibility Audits

Summary: Shadowed jail officers and built wireframes to address interface pain points. Improvements added to roadmap.
